title: Computing the optimal keyboard through a geometric analysis of the English language. (arXiv:2310.10956v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: In the context of a group project for the course COMSW4995 002 - Geometric Data Analysis, we bring our attention to the design of fast-typing keyboards. Leveraging some geometric tools in an optimization framework allowed us to propose novel keyboard layouts that offer a faster typing.
context:
Title: Computing the optimal keyboard through a geometric analysis of the English language. (arXiv:2310.10956v1 [cs.CL])
Abstract: In the context of a group project for the course COMSW4995 002 - Geometric Data Analysis, we bring our attention to the design of fast-typing keyboards. Leveraging some geometric tools in an optimization framework allowed us to propose novel keyboard layouts that offer a faster typing.
translated_title: 通过对英语语言的几何分析来计算最佳键盘设计
translated_abstract: 在COMSW4995 002 - 几何数据分析课程的小组项目中，我们将关注点放在设计快速打字键盘上。利用一些几何工具在优化框架中提供了更快打字的创新键盘布局。
tldr: 通过几何分析，我们计算出了一种最佳键盘设计，提供更快的打字速度。
